name: Overgrown (itch) (Noonmarkart)
description:
Overgrown is a RPG about using your trusty map to explore and trade items in order to find a solution to your village's problems, and save the future. You play as Mycelio, a shrooman time traveling adventurer who uses the magical roots of his people's holy Mother Tree (of Life) to travel time. 

Fen Argoff  - Artist + Composer 
Emily Amspoker  - Programmer 
Isaac Fisher - Producer + Sound Design
Alison Hu  - UI/UX Designer
Jack Tian - Programmer

All - Concept Ideation + Game Design

Sound Samples from Envato Elements. 

Special thanks to Tom Corbett and the CMU Ideate Faculty/Staff who made our event possible!
